suggestedTasks.title: Add Unit Tests for TaskDetailPaneB Component
suggestedTasks.description: Create comprehensive unit tests for the newly restructured TaskDetailPaneB component. Focus on testing tab switching functionality, content rendering, and state management for notes and details tabs. Ensure all new component logic is thoroughly validated.
suggestedTasks.reason: Ensure reliability of newly refactored component structure

suggestedTasks.title: Update Component Documentation for TaskDetailPaneB

suggestedTasks.reason: Provide clear guidance for developers working with the updated component
